abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Pieter Stek at
            the meeting of June 22, 2000 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy progress report, the Structural
            Adjustment Program, and the Financial Sector Technical
            Assistance Project for Ecuador.
